comment.author: 93183605@N07
comment._content: Ball Room, Old Government House, Waterloo Quadrant, Auckland, NZ. See an earlier photograph of the same room: natlib.govt.nz/records/23186634?search[i][century]=1800&search[i][decade]=1890&search[i][subject][]=Auckland+Region&search[i][subject][]=Waterloo+Quadrant&search[il][category]=Images&search[path]=items There are photographs of both Wellington and Auckland Government Houses in the Ranfurly Collection held by the Alexander Turnbull Library that may confirm other interiors in this series are from the same buildings: see natlib.govt.nz/items/22337596
